title: New Boost Mobile Typeface
content:
Anyone know their new typeface?

[http://www.boostmobile.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/www.boostmobile.com/ "http://www.boostmobile.com")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_64.jpg) | 19.51 KB |
| [Picture 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_22.jpg) | 15.56 KB |
| [Picture 3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_13.jpg) | 12.94 KB |

 [‹ Exaggerated, handwritten 1980's font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/node/50175 "Go to previous forum topic") [is this futura ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/node/50185 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typevolcom

comments.content:
Hi Donny,

[came up before](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20boostmobile):  
 [Spire found out it is called ‘BoostNeo Grotesk’](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45009), and [Yves suggested an alternative](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110252/http:/typophile.com/node/48925).  
F
